title: FULLY OPEN SOURCE
description: WebdriverIO is fully open source and can be found on GitHub

title: GREAT COMMUNITY
description: WebdriverIO has a great community that supports all members.

title: JS.FOUNDATION
description: The JS Foundation is host to projects that span the entire JavaScript ecosystem.

title: SUPPORT VIDEOS
description: The community around WebdriverIO is actively speaking on various user groups or conferences about specific topics around automated testing with WebdriverIO.

title: EXTENDABLE
description: Adding helper functions, or more complicated sets and combinations of existing commands is simple and really useful

title: COMPATIBLE
description: WebdriverIO works in combination with most of the TDD and BDD test frameworks in the JavaScript world
